meta.content: Aline Cleo Public Schools, Aline Cleo Schools, Aline Oklahoma, Aline, Oklahoma, Aline Cleo K12, Oklahoma High Schools, Aline Cleo High School, Aline Cleo Elementary, Aline Cleo Elementary School

meta.name: verify-v1

blockquote.p: Aline-Cleo Public Schools are located in rural Northwest Oklahoma. The Elementary School (Grades Pre-K–6) is located in Cleo Springs, OK, which is 25 miles west of Enid, OK on State Highway 412. Aline, OK is where the High School (grades 7 - 12) is located. Aline is 8 miles north of Cleo Springs on State Highway 8.

Aline and Cleo Springs are both very supportive of Aline-Cleo Public Schools. This has helped the school prosper in academics and many other extracurricular activities. We push our students to uphold the fine tradition and add their own achievements to the Aline-Cleo Public Schools legacy.

p.span: We hope that your visit here introduces you and informs you about our school staff, students, classes, activities, and both communities.

hr.p: "Each student shall be given the opportunity to develop self-motivation, an appreciation for democratic values, responsible citizenship, and foundation for life long learning."

p.br: Starting Monday April 6th, 2020 two days worth of Breakfast and Lunch will be served.

div.p: On Wednesday April 8th, three days worth of Breakfast and Lunch will be served.
There are also new pick up times, as there will be some cooked meals served.

At Cleo Elementary School the
pickup time will be from
10:30 am to 11:30 am
At Aline High School the pickup time will be from
10:30 am to 11:30 am.
At Carmen, the pick up time will be from 12:00 noon to 12:30 pm.
This will continue through the rest of the school year.
